name: openldap-admin
description:
phpLDAPadmin is a web-based LDAP client. It provides easy, anywhere-accessible, multi-language administration for your LDAP server.

This DC/OS package is ready to be used alongside the DC/OS `openldap` package. Other LDAP servers may work, but haven't been tested.
preInstallNotes:
This DC/OS Service is currently EXPERIMENTAL. There may be bugs, incomplete features, incorrect documentation, or other discrepancies.

```Advanced Installation options notes```

networking / *external_access*: create an entry in Marathon-LB for accessing the service from outside of the cluster

networking / *external_access_port*: port to be used in Marathon-LB for accessing the service.
postInstallNotes:
Service installed.

It is recommended to access this service through the endpoint created in Marathon-LB.

Default login: `cn=admin,dc=example,dc=org`/`password`.
